es.csic.iiia.normlab.onlinecomm.nsm.agent

Class CommunityAgentContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.csic.iiia.normlab.onlinecomm.nsm.agent.CommunityAgentContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EnvironmentAgentContext

    public class CommunityAgentContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements EnvironmentAgentContext
    Class that saves all the agents context (id, section, content that are uploading...) in the social network.
    Author:
    Iosu Mendizabal
